title: Obano Civilization in the Amazon | Amazing Agricultural Techniques and secrets #history #facts

tasks.task: Understand the agricultural techniques of the Obano civilization.
subtasks: Improve crop production in Amazonian soil.
Study the water system, including canals and storage ponds.
Understand the purpose of the water system for irrigation and fishing.
Examine the remains discovered in Bolivia and Brazil, such as architectural structures.
Analyze the use of local plants and animals by the Obanochians in crafts and rituals.
Reflect on the aspect of the Obano civilization that fascinates the most.

tasks.task: Understand the agricultural techniques of the Obano civilization.
